text: Taavi Veskimägi (born 20 November 1974) is a former Estonian banker and politician. He was the minister of Finance from 2003 to 2005 and one of the two former co-Chairmen of the Union of Pro Patria and Res Publica (2006–2007). Until 2014, he was in a relationship with Prime Minister Kaja Kallas. They have one son together. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Estonian politicians Category:Bankers
title: Taavi Veskimägi
